episodes.title: Half of Quiboloy’s KJC compound inspected, search for hideout narrows | INQToday
episodes.description:
The Philippine National Police has inspected about half of Kingdom of Jesus Christ’s 30-hectare compound in Davao City, as the search for fugitive televangelist Pastor Apollo Quiboloy continues.

Read more: https://inqnews.net/KJCCompoundRaid

Twitter: https://twitter.com/inquirerdotnet

episodes.title: Freeze on Quiboloy assets extended to February 2025 | INQToday
episodes.description:
The Court of Appeals has extended the freeze order on the bank accounts, real estate properties, and other assets registered in the name of fugitive televangelist Apollo Quiboloy and his Kingdom of Jesus Christ sect.

Read more: https://inqnews.net/QuiboloyAssetsFreezeOrder 

Visit us at https://www.inquirer.net
Facebook: https://facebook.com/inquirerdotnet
Twitter: https://twitter.com/inquirerdotnet

episodes.title: DILG to clarify Quiboloy court protection order, hunt continues | INQToday
episodes.description:
The Department of Interior and Local Government will file motions to the court clarifying the validity of the temporary protection order granted to the Kingdom of Jesus Christ.

Read more: https://inqnews.net/DILGOnTPOQuiboloy

Facebook: https://facebook.com/inquirerdotnet

episodes.title: Remulla: Protection order can’t prevail over arrest order vs. Quiboloy | INQToday
episodes.description:
The temporary protection order granted to Apollo Quiboloy’s Kingdom of Jesus Christ “can’t prevail” over the warrant of arrest issued against him, according to Justice Secretary Jesus Crispin Remulla.

Read more: https://inqnews.net/TPOWontPrevailQuiboloy

Facebook: https://facebook.com/inquirerdotnet
Twitter: https://twitter.com/inquirerdotnet

episodes.title: [President Ferdinand] Marcos: No human rights violations in KJC compound raid
episodes.description:
President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. maintains that there were no human rights violations during the police raid on the Kingdom of Jesus Christ compound in Davao City, adding that such claims are “political” and “untrue.”

Read more: https://newsinfo.inquirer.net/1977085/marcos-no-human-rights-violations-in-kojc-raid-such-calls-political-untrue

Twitter: https://twitter.com/inquirerdotnet

episodes.title: PNP not leaving KJC compound until Quiboloy’s arrest | INQToday
episodes.description:
The Philippine National Police says they will not leave the Kingdom of Jesus Christ compound in Davao City until Pastor Apollo Quiboloy is arrested.

Read more: https://inqnews.net/PNPNotLeavingKJC

episodes.title: PNP likely to find Quiboloy bunker entrance soon, detects ‘sign of life’ | INQToday
episodes.description:
The entrance of the underground bunker of the compound of embattled Pastor Apollo Quiboloy is likely to be found soon, according to the Philippine National Police.

Read more: https://inqnews.net/QuiboloyBunkerEntrance

episodes.title: Duterte slams human rights violation vs Quiboloy; Sara apologizes to KJC | INQToday
episodes.description:
Former President Rodrigo Duterte has called on Filipinos to pray for peace and justice as he criticized the police for what he called its abuse of authority and ignoring people’s rights in its ongoing search for televangelist and Kingdom of Jesus Christ leader Apollo Quiboloy at the group’s 30-hectare compound in Davao City.

Read more: https://inqnews.net/DuterteHumanRights 

Visit us at https://www.inquirer.net
Facebook: https://facebook.com/inquirerdotnet
Twitter: https://twitter.com/inquirerdotnet

episodes.title: Palace on Quiboloy’s arrest warrant: ‘The law must take its course’ | INQToday
episodes.description:
Malacañang says the law must take its course as the police served warrant of arrest against embattled Pastor Apollo Quiboloy. 

Read more: https://inqnews.net/PalaceOnQuiboloy

episodes.title: Quiboloy supporters 'intentionally blocked' national highway - Davao police
episodes.description:
Members of the Kingdom of Jesus Christ “intentionally blocked” the national highway near their compound along Bunganin District until the exit of Davao International Airport during a prayer vigil on Sunday night, according to police.

Read more: https://newsinfo.inquirer.net/1976578/davao-police-kjc-rally-intentionally-blocked-national-highway

episodes.title: Duterte tells Quiboloy: You’re wanted, don’t drag me into this | INQToday
episodes.description:
Former President Rodrigo Duterte veers away from allegations that he was hiding fugitive and alleged rapist Apollo Quiboloy.

episodes.description:

episodes.description:

episodes.title: LIVE: Senate resumes probe on alleged offenses of Apollo Quiboloy, church | March 5
episodes.description:
The Senate Committee on Women, Children, Family Relations, and Gender Equality resumes its probe into the alleged offenses attributed to the self-proclaimed “Appointed Son of God” Apollo Quiboloy and his church Kingdom of Jesus Christ on Tuesday, March 5, 2024.  | via Noy Morcoso

episodes.title: House panel subpoenas Quiboloy after repeated snub of hearings | INQToday
episodes.description:
A House of Representative panel issues a subpoena against Kingdom of Jesus Christ founder and leader Apollo Quiboloy.
